objectives.hint: Complete the "Keep the troll party from getting out of hand" event.
objectives.name: Woken by Peace is the current liaison to the troll community and needs help maintaining order

objectives.hint: Complete the "Work together to destroy all target while mounted on your warclaw" event.
objectives.name: Charging Ram needs help getting the warclaws to work off some steam over in the tundra.

objectives.hint: Complete the "Help Sheltering Dusk heal the wounded wolf pup" event.
objectives.name: Sheltering Dusk needs a hand helping injured animals in the lower tundra.

objectives.hint: Complete the "Collect driftwood to help repair the bridge" event.
objectives.name: Musing Fox is keeping the many bridges safe and sound, but he needs help gathering supplies.

objectives.hint: Complete the "Escort Winding Kant as he looks for his lost spear" event.
objectives.name: Winding Kant has lost something precious out in the tundra and could use some extra eyes.

objectives.hint: Complete the "Help Warming Sun heal the wounded fawn" event.
objectives.name: Warming Sun is tending to displaced animals in the forest and could use a protector.

objectives.hint: Complete the "Collect logs by using your warclaw's Chain Pull skill on trees" event.
objectives.name: Shrouded Woods is trying to meet the lowlander's wood supply needs in the forest and won't say no to help.

objectives.hint: Complete the "Defend the kodan from the bog bodies while they gather peat" event.
objectives.name: Autumn's Breath was tasked with gathering peat in the bog and needs more spears.
